name: P&H Mining Equipment. 2009. P&H 250XP-DL Dragline Application Drill, Rotary Blasthole Drill: Operating Specifications.
description:
FULL CITATION
P&H Mining Equipment. 2009. P&H 250XP-DL Dragline Application Drill, Rotary Blasthole Drill: Operating Specifications. P&H Mining Equipment. http://www.phmining.com/MinePro/Literature/Spec/250XP-DL.pdf (Accessed December 18, 2009).

DESCRIPTION
Specifications for weights and components of a rotary drill for blasthole drilling at a dragline application.
